title: Features of Jhin you may have missed that make him extremely powerful
body:
* His 4th shot is a Garen ult. It does 15-25% _missing hp_ damage in addition to the crit. With IE, it will act as a stand crit with a Garen ult attached to it, resulting in very similar damage to a rank 1 and 2 Garen ult at all times.

* His W will root on _allied damage._ Your teammate can sneeze on the enemy and you can root him from a screen away. The longest range cc on a standard ability in the game.

* His E trap spawns on enemy kill and it is basically an AOE crit. Chain reaction wombos are possible from a screen away.

* Crit/attack speed increase his attack by a %, not a flat value. This means {{item:3086}} based items are not viable alone. They require heavy AD items.
